questions.question: What is a programming language?
Difference between compiler and interpreter?

options.B: Compiler generates executable, Interpreter does not
options.C: Compiler for web, Interpreter for desktop
options.D: No difference between compiler and interpreter

options.B: Ways to organize and store data

options.D: Approach to developing machine learning models

options.D: Method to create user interfaces in web dev

options.A: Helps in creating visually appealing UI
options.B: Allows developers to work on different versions

options.B: To optimize search and retrieval operations

questions.question: What is Digital Signal Processing (DSP)?

options.A: Convert analog signals to digital format

questions.question: What is the Nyquist-Shannon sampling theorem?
Purpose of a digital filter in DSP?

options.A: Convert digital signals to analog signals
options.C: Convert analog signals to digital signals

questions.question: What is the Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) used for?

options.A: Convert time-domain signals to frequency-domain signals
options.C: Convert analog signals to digital format
options.D: Increase the resolution of digital images

questions.question: Difference between FIR and IIR filters?

options.A: FIR: continuous-time signals, IIR: discrete-time signals
options.C: FIR: infinite impulse response, IIR: finite impulse response
options.D: FIR: image processing, IIR: audio processing

questions.question: Purpose of decimation in DSP?

options.A: Increase the sampling rate of a digital signal
options.B: Decrease the sampling rate of a digital signal
options.C: Add noise to a digital signal
options.D: Convert a digital signal to an analog signal

questions.question: Role of the z-transform in DSP?

options.A: Convert continuous-time signals to discrete-time signals
options.B: Convert digital signals to analog signals
options.C: Analyze the frequency content of a digital signal

questions.question: What is aliasing in the context of DSP?

options.A: Reduce the size of a digital signal
options.C: High-frequency components misrepresented as lower frequencies
options.D: Increase the resolution of digital images

questions.question: DSP technique used for echo cancellation in audio signals?
Purpose of quantization in DSP?

options.B: Convert analog signals to digital format
options.D: Approximate a continuous range of values with a finite set of discrete values

questions.question: What is Machine Learning?

options.A: Computer science branch for hardware development
options.B: Study field for design of intelligent agents
options.C: Algorithms allowing computers to learn from data

questions.question: Primary goal of supervised learning?

options.A: Predict future outcomes from past data
options.D: Find the best action in a given situation

questions.question: AI designed to mimic human-like cognitive abilities?
Purpose of activation function in a neural network?

options.A: Determine the learning rate of the network
options.B: Adjust the weights of the neural connections
options.C: Calculate the error between predicted and actual outputs
options.D: Introduce non-linearity and enable complex modeling

questions.question: Algorithm commonly used for clustering in unsupervised learning?
Bias-variance tradeoff in machine learning?

options.A: Tradeoff between features and model complexity
options.C: Tradeoff between computational cost and performance

questions.question: Role of reinforcement learning in AI?

options.A: Optimize weights in a neural network
options.C: Enable machines to learn from feedback and rewards

questions.question: Transfer learning in the context of deep learning?

options.A: Transfer data between different neural networks
options.B: Transfer learned knowledge from one task to another
options.C: Transfer weights from one layer to another
options.D: Transfer data from local machine to the cloud

questions.question: AI technique for natural language processing and understanding?
Purpose of overfitting in machine learning?

options.A: Improve model performance on unseen data
options.B: Ensure model generalizes well to different data
options.C: Memorize training data at expense of poor performance on unseen data
options.D: Optimize the learning rate of the model

questions.question: What is feature engineering in machine learning?

options.A: Technique to generate new features automatically

questions.question: Common evaluation metric for binary classification problems?
Purpose of Adam optimizer in neural networks?

options.B: Update weights using momentum and adaptive rates
options.C: Regularize the model and prevent overfitting

questions.question: What is the Curse of Dimensionality in ML?

options.A: Challenge of dealing with missing data
options.B: Models become overly complex in high dimensions
options.D: Challenge of finding enough data for high dimensions

Role of a GAN (Generative Adversarial Network) in deep learning?

options.A: Generate random noise for data augmentation
options.B: Optimize learning rate in a neural network
options.D: Generate synthetic data and create realistic samples

options.A: Update model parameters based on training data
options.B: Compute gradient of the loss function
options.C: Propagate input data through the network to generate predictions

questions.question: Which technique is used to handle missing data?
Purpose of the backpropagation algorithm?

options.B: Compute gradient of the loss function

questions.question: Role of a decision tree in machine learning?

options.B: Optimize weights in a neural network
